The Utah Jazz have 26 losses already this season. They have a winning percentage of 62.3%.

The last team to win a championship with more than 26 losses was the 2006 Heat (30).

The last team to win a championship with a 62.3% winning percentage or under was the 1995 Rockets.

📅 On this day in 2003, the @utahjazz's Karl Malone recorded his 5,000th career assist.
